article_title: What Many 65-Year Olds Don't Know About Medicare

article_metadata.description: You know the old mantra: When you turn 65 you are eligible for Medicare and Social Security. But matters are no longer that simple. And because growing numbers of older Americans are not taking Social Security benefits until past 65, they may be making poor Medicare choices or missing out on [...]
article_metadata.author: Howard Gleckman
